name: xmrt-ecosystem
description: Full-stack XMRT-Ecosystem DAO prototype with Eliza AI integration

scripts.build: pnpm install && pnpm run build:packages && pnpm run build:agent
scripts.vercel-build: cd frontend/xmrt-dao-frontend && pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend/xmrt-dao-backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python src/main.py" "cd frontend/xmrt-dao-frontend && pnpm install && pnpm run dev"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/xmrt-dao-frontend/node_modules frontend/xmrt-dao-frontend/dist backend/xmrt-dao-backend/venv && pnpm store prune
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:automation" "cd backend/xmrt-dao-backend && python src/main.py" "cd frontend/xmrt-dao-frontend && pnpm run dev"
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend/xmrt-dao-frontend && pnpm install && cd ../../backend/xmrt-dao-backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.postinstall: turbo run build --filter=packages/* || echo "(postinstall) turbo skipped"

author: Joseph Andrew Lee (DevGruGold)
